structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents
Printing And Distribution Of Laws And Public Documents

law.catch_line: Distribution Of Laws And Documents To Members Of General Court
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 10. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] The state secretary shall, in the distribution of laws and documents to members of the general court, effect such exchanges among members as they shall direct; and he may employ such additional clerical or other assistance as may be necessary for the purpose. Copies of the laws and documents apportioned to members of the general court which remain undisposed of for three months after the end of the year in which they were issued shall revert to the commonwealth and be subject to general distribution.
